attributes.additional_details:
The Average Family Apparantly Earns around 30k Between 2 working Adults And Have 2 Children In school or Nursery education.
Life is becoming harder and harder with every bill rising and no allowance is discounts or rewards for actually going out to work.

Average bills including electric gas food and fuels all going up while wages dont increase to no where near the rise in costs. And life is becoming seemingly harder and making you feel like packing it all in and claim every benefit possible.
And stop the single parents receiving more for been single Parents. Help the workers and average People
